SEARCH
Package controller

Class AdminHomepageController

java.lang.Object
controller.AdminHomepageController
public class AdminHomepageController extends Object
Controller for the admin homepage. The admin homepage displays a list of users and allows the admin to create and delete users. The admin homepage also allows the admin to logout. The admin homepage is the first page that the admin sees after logging in.
Author:
jacobjude, ks1686
